message: Let's start with a fair split. What do you think?
You could have gotten more, but you didn't take it. Now I'm offering you less.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much. Your turn!
I'm not getting greedy, but I'm not going to give you the majority either.
I'm trying to find a sweet spot. Meet me here?
You're getting desperate, I can see it. Don't expect me to go easy on you.
I'm not giving up yet. Let's try to find a compromise that works for both of us.
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience. Take it or leave it.
I'm making a last-ditch effort. Let's try to end this fairly.
You're getting close to nothing. I'm not going to let you get the best of me.
